participant_1.name: Charlie
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a love for singing and candy.
participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i'm four years old.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and quirky, with a passion for music and gaming, but struggles with anxiety.
participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today? I just got back from blocks
I am doing well. I just finished a chocolate candy. I love it
I love to sing. I am a dog lover. I like chocolate candy
do you dream of becoming a singer ?
no, but I do like to sing. do you have a dream?
do you like candy? I love chocolate. it is hard to eat
I do not have time for it. I sing about blocks
